name: Cosmoball
description:
Cosmoball is my submission for my first game jam: "Major Jam 4:  Cosmic"

It is a short, top-down, turn-based, 2D puzzle game coded in C++.

I wasn't able to finish all the details and I wanted to add more levels but I had fun making it and I hope you enjoy playing it. 

Edit: I made a windows build  at roughly 2:00 pm August 16th but I made no changes to the actual game. It is still exactly the same as the linux build that i turned in on time. I just did this so more people would have the ability to play the game.
